story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_0100_10: Did you find any good rocks, Metagross?
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_0300_10: Want to call it a day?
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_0400_10:
Hey, Champion! Out here on an adventure
like me?
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_0600_10: Well, I wouldn’t exactly call this an adventure.
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_0700_10:
We’re just hunting for rocks like always. It’s
practically a daily routine.
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_0800_10:
Though now that we don’t need to look for
samples of sync stones ultimate anymore, it hasn’t
been as exciting.
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_1000_10:
My daily adventures have been lacking something
lately, too.
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_1100_10:
That’s why I’ve been searching around this island
every day for new adventures!
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_1200_10:
That’s great! You’re living up to your reputation as
a legendary explorer by embracing the unknown.
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_1400_10:
Are you preparing for the upcoming tournament
everyone’s been talking about?
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_1600_10:
I won’t be joining the tournament. Instead, I’ll
focus on uncovering the mysteries of the sync
stones ultimate.
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_1800_10:
Well, ever since I came to Pasio, I’ve been
noticing how the next generation of Trainers has
been growing and changing.
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_1900_10:
Watching them has made me reflect on what I
should be doing.
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_2000_10:
And I’ve come to realize that I need to be
someone who can support their growth.
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_2100_10:
I see... That’s an admirable mindset—one I’ve
seen from you before.
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_2500_10:
Seeing young talent seems to be shaking your
confidence. Am I right?
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_2700_10:
I genuinely want to support the next generation of
Trainers and help them grow.
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_2800_10:
I want to see people and Pokémon doing their
best. Is that wrong?
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_2900_10:
No, it’s not. It’s wonderful to guide young
talent and support their growth.
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_3000_10:
But that shouldn’t stop you from going on your
own adventures!
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_3100_10:
It seems like you’re trying to play it safe. You’re
saying the right things, but isn’t that you trying to
make excuses?
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_3200_10: What does your courage sensor say?!
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_3500_10:
Reliable and fearless Champions confront
challenges headfirst! Even if they’re worn down,
they push through!
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_3600_10:
The next generation of Trainers and the people
who know you well...
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_3700_10:
I bet they all want you to go on thrilling
adventures!
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_3900_10:
(I was too focused on everyone else’s growth
because they were shining so brightly...)
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_4000_10: (I didn’t even think about my own shine.)
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_4100_10:
(Maybe I have been forgetting to work on myself
and pursue my own adventures...)
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_4300_10:
This is what you were trying to tell me all along,
wasn’t it?
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_4500_10:
It seems I was indeed trying to play it safe. Now
that I’m aware of it, I’m somewhat disappointed in
myself.
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_4600_10:
Well, I must say, I’m rather excited to see your
new adventures with Metagross!
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_4800_10:
I can’t wait to see the worlds Metagross and I
discover through our adventures!
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_4900_10:
Your own courage will lead you through
unknown worlds...
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_5000_10: Ahh, yes, indeed this life is grand!
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_5100_10:
Young explorer! I look forward to our next
meeting!
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_5200_10:
OK then, Metagross! It’s time to start our
adventure!
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_5300_10: After all, when it comes down to it...
story_stone_09_01000/2401_1201_5400_10: We’re just the strongest there is right now!
